article.headline: Prairie View 76, Southern U. 60
article.story: PRAIRIE VIEW, Texas -- Derek Johnson scored 18 points and three bench players combined for 38 more in Prairie View A&M's 76-60 victory against Southern on Saturday night. Dorian McDaniel led the bench scoring for Prairie View (15-15, 12-6) with 14 points while Tim Meadows added 13 and Darnell Hugee scored 11. Jacoie Shivers also reached double figures with 10 points for the Panthers, who built a 22-point lead with 18:16 remaining and cruised from there. Southern's Chris Davis scored 22 points on 8-of-13 shooting. Douglas Scot scored 12 bench points for the Jaguars (8-22, 8-10).

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
